name: Milk
description: Client's husband is the sole breadwinner for their family with 1 child, and client is currently heavily pregnant. Family is facing a financially difficult circumstances presently. They will benefit from essential items for their children's needs.

passiton.name: New coffee/milk tea print tshirt (140, S, M, L, XL)

name: Bicycle
description: The client resides with 6 of her children. The household faces financial difficulties, client prioritizing providing children's basic needs - while having accumulated outstanding debts. This is especially so as 4 children are still studying, while her older 2 children are not working presently and she is the sole breadwinner. Considering their financially tight situation, the family wishes to request for a bicycle through PIO. We would be grateful if the donor can provide/pay for delivery of the bicycle to the client.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

passiton.name: Children bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: TV
description: Senior is staying alone in HDB rental. He has estranged relationship with his family due to mental health issues. He has fear of walking and has been homebound ever since a recent fall. Due to the lack of engagement, he felt more distressed and coped by smoking more frequently (cigarettes purchased by neighbour). We are seeking kind donor to provide him with a functional TV so he can be more meaningfully occupied

name: Wheelchair
description: My patient is a 76 years old senior receiving our home hospice care. Her mobility has been deteriorating and she is no longer able to walk on her own. As such, she needs a wheelchair so that it is easier for her kin to bring her out to the community and for her hospital appointments.

passiton.name: Foldable mobile wheelchair
passiton.description: Foldable mobile wheelchair that supports maximum weight of 60kg. Self-collection at home address.

name: Commode with wheels
description:
Commode
61-year-old patient has late stage cancer and hypertension. He requires a commode with wheels at home but he and his wife are unable to afford one. He is medically unfit for work while his wife is his caregiver. Wife hope for a new/unused one as patient are mindful about hygiene. Appreciate if donor can contact me at Whatsapp at 9727 4215. Thank you!

passiton.name: Commode with Wheels
passiton.description: Commode still in good conditions. With wheels.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

passiton.name: Commode chair with wheels
passiton.description: Very lightly used for shower time only. No rust. Seat pad over the pot allows it to be used as indoor wheelchair.
